ParamVPCCidrRange.Description: The 'x' in 10.x.0.0/16 used to create the VPC's IPv4 Class B Network. 0 - 256.

ParamNatGateway.ConstraintDescription: Whether to launch a NAT Gateway for the private subnets. true or false only.

ParamAuthorName.Description: This will be added as a tag called 'Owner' to every resource for easier management.

ParamAllowSSHFromRange.Description: IP CidrBlock to allow SSH access into for Bastions. i.e. 100.100.100.100/32

ParamBastionInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Please choose a valid instance type.

ParamBastionKeyPair.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the Bastion server.

ParamRetentionInDays.Description: The number of days Bastion logs are retained
